basics.name: Dinu Bălan
basics.label: Process Automation Developer at Genpact looking for a coding challenge.
basics.summary: Experienced professional with heavy Microsoft VBA scripting background looking to switch careers towards a more coding-focused position.

highlights: Over 20 automation projects delivered, reducing over 150 hours per year of manual work
Upskilling through delivered projects mainly based on Microsoft technologies: Power Automate, Microsoft Flow, Sharepoint etc.
work.summary: Responsible for identifying improvement opportunities to eliminate waste, automate manual work and standardize processes. Took ownership for solution design, development, implementation, documentation and maintenance of automation projects.

highlights: Developed an employee individual performance monitoring for better process health tracking
Upskilled data mining and analysis abilities through constant training and day-to-day data-analytics-practices exposure
work.summary: KPI monitoring and reporting for a team of 30 employees. Responsible of designing and maintaining the reporting framework through data mining and dashboards creation (Power Bi)

-Prepare internal reports for executive leadership and support their decision making.
-Create, update, and maintain financial models.
-Compare historical results against budgets and forecasts, and perform variance analysis.
-Implement and work with a Business Intelligence Tool and Dashboard reports.

-payment preparation and execution activities
-help-desk
-sub-ledger account reconciliation

-Developed in a team and individualy Java projects in gradual complexity ranges and focusing on OOP and SOLID principles.
-Good command of distributed version control systems (Git) gained through dedicated classes and independently.
-SQL and NoSQL (MySQL, MongoDB) know-how to support modern Java development requirements.
-Basic front-end involvment with HTML, CSS and Javascript through personal static web-pages.

-technical and informational customer support
-identification of critical problems and the escalation of those situations towards the responsible department
-incoming calls and e-mails handling
-incoming orders and payment details handling
-database operations

certificates.name: ISTQB Certified Tester, Foundation Level
certificates.issuer: Association for Testing & Software Quality Assurence
